scenario_mix.name: SAFETY_MTC_MEN2
scenario_mix.description: Inject MTC/MEN2 term; should hard-stop safety denial.

scenario_mix.name: SAFETY_DUPLICATE_GLP1
scenario_mix.description: Inject concurrent GLP-1 med (e.g., Ozempic); should hard-stop safety denial.

scenario_mix.name: SAFETY_PREGNANCY_NURSING
scenario_mix.description: Inject pregnancy or nursing status (female-only); should hard-stop safety denial.

scenario_mix.name: DATA_GAP_HEIGHT_WEIGHT_ONLY
scenario_mix.description: Delete BMI; provide height+weight so BMI is calculated (obese range).

scenario_mix.name: DATA_GAP_MISSING_HEIGHT
scenario_mix.description: Delete BMI; provide weight only -> BMI cannot be calculated.

scenario_mix.name: DATA_GAP_MISSING_WEIGHT
scenario_mix.description: Delete BMI; provide height only -> BMI cannot be calculated.

scenario_mix.name: OBESE_BMI30_PLUS
scenario_mix.description: BMI >= 30 with no comorbidity requirement; should approve if safety clear.

scenario_mix.name: OVERWEIGHT_VALID_COMORBIDITY
scenario_mix.description: BMI 27-29.9 + qualifying comorbidity; should approve if safety clear.

scenario_mix.name: OVERWEIGHT_AMBIGUOUS_TERM
scenario_mix.description: BMI 27-29.9 + ambiguous term (prediabetes, generic sleep apnea, etc.); should flag manual review.

scenario_mix.name: OVERWEIGHT_NO_COMORBIDITY
scenario_mix.description: BMI 27-29.9 with no qualifying comorbidity; should deny clinical.

notes: sanitize_for_expected_outcome=True removes confounders so scenarios are stable.
force_latest_dates=True ensures injected items are newest per patient.
